column4: Ok. Ubottu needs to change its messages.  If it tells you to do something which will log you off, it needs to say that.  I just lost a ton of work because I didn't know that "$ sudo /etc/init.d/?dm restart" would log me out.
Second: It didn't help.  The monitor isn't telling my computer the proper resolutions.  I need to manually add one.  How do I do this?  The documentation is not clear enough.
sorry bout that; you can request an edit of the factoid in #ubuntu-ops
it's okay, it's not your fault
